ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup was born from a 30-year family recipe and a vision to reimagine the dining experience. Our founder grew up watching their grandmother perfect her beef noodle soup, serving it to family and friends who couldn't get enough.
ourStory.p2: Today, we're bringing that same recipe to a wider audience, combined with innovative technology and a unique private dining pod concept that puts the focus back on the food and the experience.
ourStory.p3: Our mission is simple: serve the perfect bowl of beef noodle soup in an environment designed for enjoyment, not distraction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our mobile application, or dine at our restaurants.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our services.

personalData.title: Personal Data You Provide
items: Name, email address, and phone number
Payment information (processed securely by our payment provider)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Communicate with you about orders and promotions
Maintain the security of our platform

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your information with:
sharing.serviceProviders: Third parties who help us operate our business (payment processors, delivery services)
sharing.businessPartners: Partners who help us provide services to you
sharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
sharing.noSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
items: Access the personal data we hold about you

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us:

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We're committed to making Oh! Beef Noodle Soup accessible to everyone.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: At Oh! Beef Noodle Soup, we believe everyone deserves to enjoy the perfect bowl of beef noodle soup. We are committed to ensuring our digital platforms and physical locations are accessible to people of all abilities.

website.title: Website Accessibility
website.intro: We strive to ensure our website meets WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. Our ongoing accessibility efforts include:
items: Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements

restaurant.title: Restaurant Accessibility
restaurant.intro: Our physical locations are designed with accessibility in mind:
items: Wheelchair accessible entrances and dining areas

ordering.title: Ordering Assistance
ordering.content: If you need assistance placing an order or have questions about our accessibility features, our team is happy to help. Contact us at

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Oh! Beef Noodle Soup. Please let us know if you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement.
